title: Actor input schema
description: This is the actor input schema

APIFY_TOKEN.title: APIFY_TOKEN
APIFY_TOKEN.description: Token of your Apify account to access datasets

APIFY_USERNAME.title: Apify Username
APIFY_USERNAME.description: User name of your Apify account to access datasets

DATASET_NAME.title: DATASET_NAME
DATASET_NAME.description: Name of the dataset to be downloaded.

ZIP_IncludedStores.title: ZIP_IncludedStores
ZIP_IncludedStores.description: Any key-value store names to include in the zipping process. If empty, all stores will be included.

ZIP_ExcludedStores.title: ZIP_ExcludedStores
ZIP_ExcludedStores.description: Any key-value store names to exlude from the zipping process. If empty, no stores will be excluded.

FILES_PER_ZIP.title: FILES_PER_ZIP
FILES_PER_ZIP.description: Number of items in each ZIP file

MAX_SIZE_MB.title: MAX_SIZE_MB
MAX_SIZE_MB.description: Size in Megabytes of each ZIP file

zip.title: zip
zip.description: Whether to zip the dataset or not

DOWNLOAD.title: Should download?
DOWNLOAD.description: Whether to download the data of dataset or not
